functions.name: k8s_network_flow_control
functions.description: Checks if network flow control is configured for k8s_network.

functions.name: k8s_network_data_flow_diagram_maintain
functions.description: Checks if data flow diagram maintenance is configured for k8s_network.

functions.name: k8s_network_allowed_services_protocols_ports
functions.description: Checks allowed services, protocols, and ports for k8s_network.

functions.name: k8s_network_secure_insecure_services
functions.description: Checks secure and insecure services for k8s_network.

functions.name: k8s_network_nsc_config_file_security
functions.description: Checks NSC config file security for k8s_network.

functions.name: k8s_network_policy_deny_all_inbound
functions.description: Checks if deny-all-inbound network policy is configured for k8s_network.

functions.name: k8s_network_policy_deny_all_outbound
functions.description: Checks if deny-all-outbound network policy is configured for k8s_network.

functions.name: k8s_network_policy_deny_wireless_to_cde
functions.description: Checks if deny wireless to CDE network policy is configured for k8s_network.

functions.name: k8s_network_policy_trusted_untrusted_boundary
functions.description: Checks trusted/untrusted boundary network policy for k8s_network.

functions.name: k8s_network_policy_inbound_restriction
functions.description: Checks inbound restriction network policy for k8s_network.

functions.name: k8s_service_insecure_protocols_detection
functions.description: Detects insecure protocols for k8s_network services.

functions.name: k8s_network_change_default_wireless_settings
functions.description: Checks if default wireless settings are changed for k8s_network.

functions.name: k8s_network_wireless_key_rotation
functions.description: Checks wireless key rotation for k8s_network.

functions.name: k8s_ingress_http_header_monitoring
functions.description: Monitors HTTP headers for k8s_network ingress.

functions.name: k8s_network_internet_access_restriction_check
functions.description: Checks internet access restriction for k8s_network.

functions.name: k8s_service_internet_access_restriction
functions.description: Checks internet access restriction for k8s_network services.

notes: All functions are based on Kubernetes K8S_NETWORK API.
Ensure proper RBAC permissions are configured.
K8S_NETWORK is a Kubernetes component for network management.
Configuration, security, monitoring, network, and compliance are key aspects.
Implement appropriate retry logic for API calls.
Use Kubernetes client libraries for API interactions.
